title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: the easiest way to get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other open-source LLMs locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama models as standard LangChain LLMs and embedders.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-like interface) with multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG, and user management.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers synchronous/asynchronous APIs and Kotlin coroutines support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models, history persistence, and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement via a VS Code extension and inline completions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB; ingest PDFs and chat over documents.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community-driven recipes: function-calling, vision, fine-tuning, Docker, Kubernetes, and edge deployments.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any server with slash commands and conversation threads.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-nvidia
summary: Mega-thread discussing native NVIDIA GPU acceleration, CUDA images, and performance tuning tips.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial but actively maintained Rust crate that wraps the Ollama REST API with async/await.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community Go client for Ollama with idiomatic error handling and context cancellation.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that listens for mentions and replies using any Ollama model; deploy via Docker in minutes.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for reproducible LLM tests.

title: ollama-macos-swift
summary: Swift package exposing Ollama API using async/await for native macOS/iOS apps.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component template that wires Ollama models into a shareable web app with session memory.
